bookOffer(uint256,uint256).details: Allow user to put tokens for sale, it is booked as an offer {amount: number of tokens to sell, price: price per token}.

returns._0: boolean indicating the success of the booking.

buyOffer(address,uint256,uint8).details: Allow user to buy the tokens that are for sale

params._index: index of the offer in the offerBooking array.
params._numberOfTokens: number of tokens the buyer wants to buy.

returns._0: boolean indicating the success of the transaction.

buyTokens(uint256).details: Allow user to buy ERC20 tokens.

params._numberOfTokens: Number of Tokens the user decided to buy.
